name: Mystery at Greveholm
description:
The Mystery at Greveholm is a simple adventure game for kids, based on a popular Swedish kids' Christmas television show made in 1996. The game is the first in a series of games for kids based on the show.

You are in castle Greveholm, where the legend says that a spaceship landed in the late 19th century. Aboard the ship was an alien princess, who was captured by the count of the castle and imprisoned in the dungeons. The count is dead now, but his ghostly skeleton still haunts the castle. You have to find the princess's robot, Sprak, who can help you in your quest to free the princess, and make sure that she returns safely to her own world.

The game is a simple point-and-click adventure game, where you move between rooms by the arrow keys, while each room is a static image. You'll have to solve puzzles and play mini-games to advance the story.
